topic.title: Existence Of History Of Condition Or Surgery - conformance rules

section.p: Indicator of whether patient has a history of significant medical conditions or procedures

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11452 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.60"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11167)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67793-0" Has the patient had any significant medical conditions NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10067)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10068)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 has proper values, the value should be TRUE.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11167)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67793-0" Has the patient had any significant medical conditions NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10067)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10068)
If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "Refused " or "Unable to Complete," the value should be "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 is "None Reported," the value should be FALSE. If NEMSIS EHistory. 08 has proper values, the value should be TRUE.

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.60"/> <code code="67793-0" displayName="Has the patient had any significant medical conditions NEMSIS"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation>

p.ph: Existence Of History Of Condition Or Surgery
